PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceHeaterTypeHydronic
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Hydronic space heater type common attributes. WaterProperties attribute deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcWaterProperties instead.

PropertyDef.Name: TubingLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Water tube length inside the component.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterContent
PropertyDef.Definition: Weight of water content within the heater.
